General.Name: Cofix Group Ltd
General.Description: Cofix Group Ltd operates and franchises coffee shops, supermarkets, and bars in Israel. It operates 230 coffee shop branches. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Kefar Sava, Israel. Cofix Group Ltd is a subsidiary of Rami Levi Chain Stores Hashikma Marketing 2006 Ltd.

3.Name: Yehuda  Gavison
3.Title: VP of Locating Properties and Concessionaires in Urban
